sentences.en: Accordingly, the director lets him what to do again extemporaneous creation.
sentences.cn: 因此, 导演让他不要再搞什么即兴创作.

sentences.en: Nixon carried away with it all, delivered his extemporaneous toast.
sentences.cn: 尼克松对一切都很满意, 颇有些情不自禁地发表了他的即席祝酒词.

sentences.en: Spoken, performed, done, or composed with little or no preparation ; extemporaneous.
sentences.cn: 即席的, 无准备的:毫无准备地说 、 表演 、 做或作曲的;临场的.

sentences.en: The extemporaneous interesting hobby, achievement effect that produces to people behavior.
sentences.cn: 即爱好爱好 、 成就等对人们行为产生的影响.

sentences.en: This true love and extemporaneous humour, make full - court audience uses a facial expression for it.
sentences.cn: 这真挚的感情和即兴的幽默, 使全场听众为之动容.
